title: [Self-Directed] Smoking Cessation Counseling Expert Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic health management and counseling techniques
context.additional_context: A blended program for developing smoking cessation counseling competencies for corporate health management administrators, combining online modules and role-playing

learning_goals: After completing online modules, learners achieve 80% or higher scores on knowledge assessments of the 5A approach (Ask, Advise, Assess, Assist, Arrange) in smoking cessation counseling
After role-play training, learners achieve an average of 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale in OSCE evaluations of smoking cessation counseling scenario performance
Through PBL team projects, learners develop and present smoking cessation program designs applicable to real corporate environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
